name: Beidou
title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.
description.3: Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
description.6: Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.
description.7: Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro>. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.
description.8: The shield possesses the following properties:
9: Applies the <electro>Electro element</electro> to Beidou upon activation.
description.11: Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!

description.0: Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to nearby opponents.
3: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.
description.5: A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.
description.7: With a peal of thunder, Haishan is slain.

description.0: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
1: DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

description.0: Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
description.2: This shield absorbs <electro>Electro DMG</electro> 250% more effectively.

constellation2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises

description.0: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.
Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
